title: [Large-Scale] Visual Interaction Design for Virtual Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: IMS Learning Design Core Concepts and Experience with Mobile Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Optimization of collaborative learning environments to enhance practical science competencies within organizations

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify four types of interactions (learner-content, learner-learner, learner-instructor, learner-tool) in an IMS LD-based virtual environment.
Learners can visually determine activity synchronization status with 85% or higher accuracy via a mobile interface.
Learners can recognize their current role in multi-role settings within 3 seconds and perform assigned tasks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
